job.title: Senior, Software Engineer, Linux/Android OS
job.description: <strong>Job Description<br><br></strong>We are looking for an OS developer interested in building the next generation Augmented Reality operating system using industry-standard tools and technologies. This is an opportunity for you to contribute to the development of a new class of mobile computing devices that will transform the enterprise.<br><br><strong>Responsibilities<br></strong><ul><li>Work on multiple levels of the OS stack, from drivers to frameworks</li><li>Leverage native APIs for deep integration with all platforms.</li><li>Diagnose and fix bugs </li><li>Maintain code and write automated tests to ensure the product is of the highest quality</li><li>Write documentation</li><li>Mentor and guide other engineers<br></li></ul><strong>Qualifications<br></strong><ul><li>Strong knowledge of embedded software development</li><li>Strong knowledge of Linux or AOSP</li><li>Thorough knowledge of modern C/C++ standards, libraries and best practices</li><li>Strong knowledge of at least one scripting language among the following: Python, JavaScript</li><li>Proficient knowledge of C/C++ build toolchains</li><li>Familiarity with build scripting languages (e.g. CMake, Ninja, GYP, GN, GNU Autotools, Meson)<br></li></ul><strong><u>Education<br></u></strong><ul><li>7+ years experience with Embedded Linux Development</li><li>5+ years experience with C/C++</li><li>3+ years experience with Android</li><li>Open Source experience strongly recommended</li><li>AOSP development is a plus</li><li>Bachelor of Science in Computer Science or Engineering required. Master’s Degree preferred. </li></ul> <strong>Additional Information<br></strong><ul><li>All your information will be kept confidential according to Equal Employment Opportunities guidelines.</li></ul>
